data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,676 believers in Faranah, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Faranah, Guinea
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 6,676 believers in Faranah to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, it’s possible most of the 902,153 lost people in  Faranah, Guinea have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 6,676 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Manya, Mandingo people.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Faranah, Guinea will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Faranah, Guinea.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 6,676 believers in the state of Faranah with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

location.name: Faranah
location.people_groups_list: Kissi, Maninka, Eastern, Bandi, Lele, Toma
